website_summaries.verdict: The Asics Gel Cumulus 19 gained generally positive remarks from its fans. They loved its comfortable nature, the lightweight disposition, the color schemes, and its efficient components. For them, it’s a solid option for the roads. But there were those who experienced some discrepancies with the way that it was constructed, stating that some areas weren’t very well-made.
pros: More than a few runners commented that the Asics Gel Cumulus 19 felt true-to-size
A lot of testers felt that, for the number of features that they’d received from this shoe, the price was very reasonable
The available color schemes won over the hearts of those who have tried it
Generally, people thought that it was comfortable and efficient right out of the box
The underfoot cushioning system staved off some foot-discomfort, several runners noted
Runners liked the fact that this comes with different width options
Based on user response, the traction given by the outsole was reliable
cons: Some runners reported that the fit was too narrow in the forefoot section
their toes apparently got pinched together too much
The shoelaces weren’t strong and they tore apart easily, a few users complained
The foam mid-sole wasn’t as responsive or comfortable as expected, several purchasers noted

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size bigger than your usual size
customer_reviews.text: Bought these running shoes after research recommended them for people who run with supination. Previous running shoes have worn down the outside of the heel in a matter of weeks, running four times a week. The ASICS running shoes are not showing any signs of premature wear. I feel they have improved my running. I’m more than pleased with them.
customer_reviews.author: Colin Massey

customer_reviews.title: Too small & a bit cheap-looking.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my usual size 10 but way, way too small-toe box quite narrow and short. The shoe itself is also rather cheap-looking and didn’t seem that it would last too long before falling apart. The quality definitely isn’t the same as other trainers. Processed a return about 2 seconds after opening and trying on, which, in all fairness, has been dealt with quickly. Ordered GT 2000 8 as replacement which are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Gareth W.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I've been happily buying the Asics Gel-Cumulus for years and these are the only trainers I run in. I always buy 11.5UK, but I found the Gel-Cumulus 19 series they are coming up too small. The width was fine, but my toe was pushing into the end. Have sent these back and ordered half a size up.
customer_reviews.author: gmar

customer_reviews.title: Continues to fit and perform as it should
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wearing the Asics Gel Cumulus for nearly ten years now and he hands down loves the shoe. As clothing and shoe makers change their design and quality to keep up with global demand and supply, Asics continues to make a shoe that fits and performs as it should. Upon opening the box, my husband was mildly skeptical given this, but he has been pleased and finds comfort in knowing that he can continue to trust the Asics brand.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Beeson

customer_reviews.title: Good fit know
customer_reviews.text: I normal take a size 8 to 8.5 but these running shoes tend to be a bit on the small size so a 9.5 are just the right size for me. I would recommend getting a size bigger than you would usually take in this make of shoe
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Too small,
customer_reviews.text: Have to agree with other reviews regarding shoes coming up small. Husband has worn this model and make of shoes for years in a size 10. These ones however were too small, his toe touching the end of the shoe. Have exchanged and ordered a half size up. Still awaiting delivery so not sure if half a size larger will suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Kim F.

customer_reviews.title: Progress? I’m not so sure
customer_reviews.text: A good, supportive neutral running shoe, however they are a tighter fit so definitely go up half a size when ordering. I gave 4 stars because i don’t think the comfort or construction is as good as it once was. I had a pair of cumulus 15’s and they were definitely better on both counts - I expected better really!
customer_reviews.author: Mr D.

customer_reviews.title: Good trainer
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes take half or one size bigger then normal because are quite tight , not wide like ASICS GT 2000 7
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: good, but order 1/2 size larger
customer_reviews.text: I had read previous reviews saying they came up a bit small and ordered a half size larger than usual. I always run in asics, perfect again, very comfy even after 5miles
customer_reviews.author: Stormygirl

customer_reviews.title: Great ASICS as always
customer_reviews.text: Another great pair of Cumuluses (?) I've used these through multiple generations and these are the best yet snug but comfortable fit. Heel end less likely to bend and become uncomfortable as they grow a little older. Thumbs up from me.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. M. S. Longley

customer_reviews.title: They are not for me they are a gift
customer_reviews.text: I cannot comment on these items they are a Birthday Gift for someone in January
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Jean Barlow

customer_reviews.title: and really comfortable on the
customer_reviews.text: Quite expensive but my last pair lasted 4 year .and really comfortable on the feet
customer_reviews.author: jhj

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, little heavy
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe at a good price but it was a little heavier than expected. Fits really snuggly and is of quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Melrose

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: These were to replace my cumulus 18s that had worn out fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Sean O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: ASICS running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Quite comfy and supportive but narrow and pinches toes but on wearing does stretch. Good for the money
customer_reviews.author: Roger shepherds

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Just Ran the Cardiff Half Marathon with these straight out of the box and had no issues at all , great fit good cushioning and lightweight very pleased with the result
customer_reviews.author: Roger Reed

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great Running shoe, but really should be for nearly 100 quid...
customer_reviews.author: Stu

customer_reviews.title: Good everyday runnning shoe
customer_reviews.text: My street shoe size is 11 but I brought in size 12 as I have previously had cumulus 18's fitted in a shop at this size. The fit is good, the toe has got noticeably narrower than the previous edition but I like this having naturally narrow feet. Overall very happy, comfortable out the box and also look better than in photos.
customer_reviews.author: SHusband

customer_reviews.title: Why change a good thing
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. Have worn Asics Cumulus for years, but this version appear to have been redesigned so that the toe box is quite narrow.
customer_reviews.author: John Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Asics Gel Cumulus are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: For a neutral pronation runner, Asics Gel Cumulus are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Magichat

customer_reviews.title: Expensive to return if the size is Wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Trainers looked good. But even though I ordered 1/2 a size bigger we’re still too small. I returned them and it cost £12.50 to France! Not sure if I will get the money back.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Good running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of running shoes at a good price. These replaced my Gel 17s.
customer_reviews.author: C Hardwick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. I love them! (A little bigger than I thought).
customer_reviews.author: Emma W.

customer_reviews.title: Good comfortable trainer that fits well and lasting well
customer_reviews.text: Good comfortable trainer that fits well and lasting well. Though the laces do seem too long leaving you with 2 big loops to tuck away somewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Alyn S Hocking

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe - but believe the 1/2 size point reviewers are making!
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are a little on the tight side. However still quite comfortable and have helped solve a recurring calf injury by cushioning the impact properly compared to last old and tired pair! Would go half a size bigger next time.
customer_reviews.author: Neil Marsden

customer_reviews.title: Quality dont come cheap
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is a definitive issue, i bought my normal size but should have gone a half size up. If your new to asics heed the reviews and get bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: martin

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as expected and glad I ordered half a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: RGH100

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Listened to previous reviewers and bought half a size larger than normal. A bit too big, will have to buy some time inserts.
customer_reviews.author: S.Edon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes but small made
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes but had to take a half size larger than I usually do in Asics
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good overall, but a few quality changes that I don't like
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of the older models, but the new models seem to have a slightly different fit and I feel the ball of my foot slipping a little, while the heel seems fine - perhaps they're a little wider than before? The new construction around the toes doesn't appear to be as robust as previous models, and wore down much faster for me - my big toe always wears a little hole at the toe seam (for any trainers). I still recommend these because I've worn Cumulus for over 10 years, and they are comfortable, but this definitely feels like a step backwards in terms of fit and quality for me. I'm searcing for some 17s and 18s next time.
customer_reviews.author: Ciarán

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes - eventually
customer_reviews.text: Shoes seem to be as expected. Arrived two days late despite being Prime purchases.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Awful sizing across whole ASICS gel range
customer_reviews.text: I have tried on ASICS gel shoes in stores, and seem to take a size 8.5. I ordered the gel pulse 9 shoes which were MILES too small. Could barely fit into them. Then ordered these which were still too small around the toes, but considerably bigger than the previous ones. I then went into a shop and bought the gel excite shoes which were a perfect fit, if anything slightly too big. The sizing for ASICS shoes is awful. All 3 pairs were advertised as 8.5, but in reality the size varies so much. Don’t buy them from amazon, save a bit more money and try them in store unless you don’t mund sending back multiple pairs
customer_reviews.author: Alex F

product_meta.title: ASICS Men's Gel-Cumulus 19 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Asics gel cumulus 19 for men's, suitable for medium to long distances and with slimmest upper with very few stitching and heat-tight details ensure comfort without sacrificing support. Gel cushioning elements in the forefoot and rear foot area round off this shoe with proven spring back. The fluid ride midsole technology provides an efficient run on long and short distances. The ahar material, present in the sole, gives the foot a greater absorption and strength. I.G.S technology supports the natural foot movement and gives stability. Thanks to the highly effective guidance-line and trusstic system® technology the foot is safely guided by the step cycle and supports your running movement during fatigue. Removable sockliner that provides cushioning performance and moisture wicking for a cooler, dryer, healthier environment.
